#summary JUnit instructions for eclipse.

= Introduction =

How to add JUnit tests to your eclipse application.

= Details =

Add reference to junit library
  * jUnit library could be found in "ext/junit-4.7.jar" path of repository
  * In Eclipse
  ** Select Project->Properties->Java Build Path->Libraries
  ** "Add External JARs"->"../../ext/junit-4.7.jar" (Path to junit-4.7.jar)

Add some tests...

Compile and run
 * Run->Run Configurations
 * Add New JUnit configuration
 * Select "Run all tests in the selected project"
 * Run

== Example ==
{{{
import org.junit.*;
import org.junit.Assert;

public class Tests {
	
	@Test 
	public void simpleAdd() {	     
	    Assert.assertTrue((1+2) == (3));
	}
} 
}}}
